nrqlQueries.query: FROM Metric SELECT latest(device_name) AS 'Device Name', latest(src_addr) AS 'Device IP', latest(SysObjectID) AS 'SysObjectID', latest(entity.type) AS 'Entity Type', latest(instrumentation.name) AS 'Ktranslate Profile', latest(kentik.snmp.Uptime)/8640000 AS 'Uptime (Days)', latest(timestamp) AS 'Last Update', latest(PollingHealth) AS 'Polling Health', latest(PollingHealthReason) AS 'Health Reason', latest(kentik.snmp.packet_loss) AS 'Packet Loss', latest(model), latest(serial_number) WHERE instrumentation.name = 'liebert-ac'

FROM Metric SELECT latest(kentik.snmp.temp_f) AS 'Temp F', latest(kentik.snmp.temp_c) AS 'Temp C', latest(temp_setting) AS 'Temp Setting', latest(temp_tolerance) AS 'Temp Tolerance' WHERE instrumentation.name = 'liebert-ac'
FROM Metric SELECT latest(kentik.snmp.relative_humidity) AS 'Relative Humidity' WHERE instrumentation.name = 'liebert-ac'

FROM Metric SELECT min(kentik.snmp.temp_f) AS 'Min Temp F', average(kentik.snmp.temp_f) AS 'Average Temp F', max(kentik.snmp.temp_f) AS 'Max Temp F', min(kentik.snmp.temp_c) AS 'Min Temp C', average(kentik.snmp.temp_c) AS 'Average Temp C', max(kentik.snmp.temp_c) AS 'Max Temp C' WHERE instrumentation.name = 'liebert-ac' TIMESERIES 5 MINUTES

FROM Metric SELECT min(kentik.snmp.relative_humidity) AS 'Min Humidity', max(kentik.snmp.relative_humidity) AS 'Max Humidity', average(kentik.snmp.relative_humidity) AS 'Average Humidity' WHERE instrumentation.name = 'liebert-ac' TIMESERIES 5 MINUTES

FROM Metric SELECT latest(kentik.snmp.lgpEnvStatisticsComp1RunHr) AS 'Compressor 1', latest(kentik.snmp.lgpEnvStatisticsComp2RunHr) AS 'Compressor 2', latest(kentik.snmp.lgpEnvStatisticsFanRunHr) AS 'Fan', latest(kentik.snmp.lgpEnvStatisticsReheat1RunHr) AS 'Reheat 1', latest(kentik.snmp.lgpEnvStatisticsReheat2RunHr) AS 'Reheat 2', latest(kentik.snmp.lgpEnvStatisticsReheat3RunHr) AS 'Reheat 3' WHERE instrumentation.name = 'liebert-ac'

FROM Metric SELECT max(kentik.snmp.lgpEnvStatisticsComp1RunHr) AS 'Compressor 1', max(kentik.snmp.lgpEnvStatisticsComp2RunHr) AS 'Compressor 2', max(kentik.snmp.lgpEnvStatisticsFanRunHr) AS 'Fan', max(kentik.snmp.lgpEnvStatisticsReheat1RunHr) AS 'Reheat 1', max(kentik.snmp.lgpEnvStatisticsReheat2RunHr) AS 'Reheat 2', max(kentik.snmp.lgpEnvStatisticsReheat3RunHr) AS 'Reheat 3' WHERE instrumentation.name = 'liebert-ac' TIMESERIES 5 MINUTES
